entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Light snow and local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 12:28 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:28 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
